verses.verse: But <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> your <S%H1254>Creator,<s%> O <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> And He who <S%H3335>formed<s%> you, O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "Do not <S%H3372>fear,<s%> for I have <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> you; I have <S%H7121>called<s%> you by <S%H8034>name;<s%> you are Mine!

<S%H3588>"When<s%> you <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> I will be with you; And through the <S%H5104>rivers,<s%> they will not <S%H7857>overflow<s%> you. <S%H3588>When<s%> you <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H1119>through<s%> the <S%H784>fire,<s%> you will not be <S%H3554>scorched,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> will the <S%H3852>flame<s%> <S%H1197>burn<s%> you.

"For I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> The <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> your <S%H3467>Savior;<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> as your <S%H3724>ransom,<s%> <S%H3568>Cush<s%> and <S%H5434>Seba<s%> in your <S%H8478>place.<s%>

<S%H4480>"Since<s%> <S%H834><s%> you are <S%H3365>precious<s%> in My <S%H5869>sight,<s%> [Since] you are <S%H3513>honored<s%> and I <S%H157>love<s%> you, I will <S%H5414>give<s%> [other] <S%H120>men<s%> in your <S%H8478>place<s%> and [other] <S%H3816>peoples<s%> in <S%H8478>exchange<s%> for your <S%H5315>life.<s%>
"Do not <S%H3372>fear,<s%> for I am with you; I will <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H2233>offspring<s%> from the <S%H4217>east,<s%> And <S%H6908>gather<s%> you from the <S%H4628>west.<s%>

"I will <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H6828>north,<s%> <S%H5414>'Give<s%> [them] up!' And to the <S%H8486>south,<s%> 'Do not <S%H3607>hold<s%> [them] <S%H3607>back.<s%>' <S%H935>Bring<s%> My <S%H1121>sons<s%> from <S%H7350>afar,<s%> And My <S%H1323>daughters<s%> from the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%>

<S%H3605>Everyone<s%> who is <S%H7121>called<s%> by My <S%H8034>name,<s%> And whom I have <S%H1254>created<s%> for My <S%H9202>glory,<s%> Whom I have <S%H3335>formed,<s%> <S%H637>even<s%> whom I have <S%H6213>made.<s%> "

<S%H3318>Bring<s%> out the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5787>who<s%> are <S%H5787>blind,<s%> even though they <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> And the <S%H2795>deaf,<s%> even though they have <S%H241>ears.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> have <S%H6908>gathered<s%> <S%H9191>together<s%> In order that the <S%H3816>peoples<s%> may be <S%H622>assembled.<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> among them can <S%H5046>declare<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> And <S%H8085>proclaim<s%> to us the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H7223>things<s%>? Let them <S%H5414>present<s%> their <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> that they may be <S%H6663>justified,<s%> Or let them <S%H8085>hear<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> "It is <S%H571>true.<s%>"

"You are My <S%H5707>witnesses,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "And My <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I have <S%H977>chosen,<s%> In <S%H4616>order<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> and <S%H539>believe<s%> Me, And <S%H995>understand<s%> that I am He. <S%H6440>Before<s%> Me there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H3335>formed,<s%> And there will be <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> Me.
"I, even I, am the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> And <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3467>savior<s%> <S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H1107><s%> Me.

"It is I who have <S%H5046>declared<s%> and <S%H3467>saved<s%> and <S%H8085>proclaimed,<s%> And <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H410>[god<s%>] among you; So you are My <S%H5707>witnesses,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "And I am God.

<S%H1571>"Even<s%> from <S%H3117>eternity<s%> I am He; And <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>none<s%> who can <S%H5337>deliver<s%> out of My <S%H3027>hand;<s%> I <S%H6466>act<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H7725>reverse<s%> it?"

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H1350>Redeemer,<s%> the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "For your <S%H4616>sake<s%> I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> And will <S%H3381>bring<s%> them <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> as <S%H1281>fugitives,<s%> Even the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> into the <S%H591>ships<s%> in which they <S%H7440>rejoice.<s%>
"I am the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> your <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One,<s%> The <S%H1254>Creator<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> your <S%H4428>King.<s%>"

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Who <S%H5414>makes<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%> through the <S%H3220>sea<s%> And a <S%H9350>path<s%> through the <S%H5794>mighty<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%>

Who <S%H3318>brings<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> and the <S%H5483>horse,<s%> The <S%H2428>army<s%> and the <S%H5808>mighty<s%> <S%H5808>man<s%> (They will <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H9191>together<s%> [and] not <S%H6965>rise<s%> again; They have been <S%H3518>quenched<s%> [and] <S%H3518>extinguished<s%> like a <S%H6594>wick<s%>):
"Do not <S%H2142>call<s%> to <S%H2142>mind<s%> the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H7223>things,<s%> Or <S%H995>ponder<s%> <S%H6931>things<s%> of the <S%H6931>past.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2319>something<s%> <S%H2319>new,<s%> <S%H6258>Now<s%> it will <S%H6779>spring<s%> <S%H6779>forth;<s%> Will you not be <S%H3045>aware<s%> of it? I will <S%H637>even<s%> <S%H7760>make<s%> a <S%H1870>roadway<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H5104>Rivers<s%> in the <S%H3452>desert.<s%>

"The <S%H9130>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> will <S%H3513>glorify<s%> Me; The <S%H8565>jackals<s%> and the <S%H3284>ostriches;<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> And <S%H5104>rivers<s%> in the <S%H3452>desert,<s%> To <S%H8248>give<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> to My <S%H972>chosen<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>
"The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2098>whom<s%> I <S%H3335>formed<s%> for Myself, Will <S%H5608>declare<s%> My <S%H8416>praise.<s%>
"Yet you have not <S%H7121>called<s%> on Me, O <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> But you have <S%H3021>become<s%> <S%H3021>weary<s%> of Me, O <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"You have not <S%H935>brought<s%> to Me the <S%H7716>sheep<s%> of your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings;<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> have you <S%H3513>honored<s%> Me with your <S%H2077>sacrifices.<s%> I have not <S%H5647>burdened<s%> you with <S%H4503>offerings,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> <S%H3021>wearied<s%> you with <S%H3828>incense.<s%>

"You have <S%H7069>bought<s%> Me <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7070>sweet<s%> <S%H7070>cane<s%> with <S%H3701>money,<s%> <S%H3808>Neither<s%> have you <S%H7301>filled<s%> Me with the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of your <S%H2077>sacrifices;<s%> <S%H389>Rather<s%> you have <S%H5647>burdened<s%> Me with your <S%H9128>sins,<s%> You have <S%H3021>wearied<s%> Me with your <S%H5771>iniquities.<s%>
"I, even I, am the one who <S%H4229>wipes<s%> out your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> for My own <S%H4616>sake;<s%> And I will not <S%H2142>remember<s%> your <S%H9128>sins.<s%>

<S%H2142>"Put<s%> Me in <S%H2142>remembrance;<s%> let us <S%H8199>argue<s%> our <S%H8199>case<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> <S%H5608>State<s%> your [cause,] that you may be <S%H6663>proved<s%> <S%H6663>right.<s%>
"Your <S%H7223>first<s%> forefather <S%H1>sinned,<s%> And your <S%H2398>spokesmen<s%> have <S%H9238>transgressed<s%> against Me.

"So I will <S%H2490>pollute<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary;<s%> And I will <S%H5414>consign<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> to the <S%H9172>ban,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1421>revilement.<s%>
